system.description: Effect: You equip 1 Held item you have on your person or within Physical Reach that you have access to, or store an equipped Held item in your Container or another slot if applicable. At the start of combat you can use this action as a Free Action as long as you are not @Affliction[distracted] or @Affliction[flinched].

actions.name: Draw/Store
actions.description: Effect: You equip 1 Held item you have on your person or within Physical Reach that you have access to, or store an equipped Held item in your Container or another slot if applicable. At the start of combat you can use this action as a Free Action as long as you are not @Affliction[distracted] or @Affliction[flinched].
